frontmatter.description: Allows access to a secondary structure system up-to member that is created between a selected point and one or more primary structure system members or between one or more point-member pairs.

title: ISecondaryMemberUpToMembersFeatureData
description: Allows access to a secondary structure system up-to member that is created between a selected point and one or more primary structure system members or between one or more point-member pairs.
